name: Gilgamesh
text:
Haste
When Gilgamesh attacks, roll a d20:
1-9 | Create a Crystal token and lose 1 life.
10-19 | Gilgamesh has 1 of the following at random until end of turn: Trample, hexproof, lifelink, indestructible, flying, vigilance.
20 | Gilgamesh has all of its 10-19 abilities until end of turn. Create a Crystal token.
